phrases: I thought if I came to the music room, you would be here...
But I have no way of contacting you.
I do not know your phone number or your email address.
She collapsed, and she is in the hospital.
I was going to contact you,
but I was not quite up to it,
and so I thought if you could withdraw...
Sorry I could not make it.
Her family runs a cake shop, you know!
Well, it is the thought that counts.
I am just in here for tests.
Did you miss not seeing me?
Twice in such a short time.
But you were in here for tests the other day, were not you?
That time, it was for new tests, just for the heck of it.
This time, it is also so I can rest up, and take more time to heal.
You just leered at me with a dirty look in your eyes!
Lusting after me no matter where you are!
Is it because I am an invalid?
I did not lust after you!
But hey, that was a shock.
You do not show up, and next thing we hear, you are in the hospital.
It was a shock for me, too.
I mean, I stumbled and hit my head, and then...
My parents totally lost it and sent me right to the hospital.
And now we are all caught up.
Oh, the fig tart for me!
I have always tired easily, but lately I have had to expend a lot of energy,
so I guess I pushed myself too hard.
She is expending energy as she eats.
I brought you some books, too!
You have got nothing to do in here, right?
Are these books from the library?
Did you bring them without permission?
There are some about music, too.
What is she going to do with a ton of books?
Well, Kao-chan, you will be coming back to school by the second semester, right?
To think that it seemed rehearsed...
Let us hook up in our dreams, okay?
I do not have time to read all these...
He says, Let us go to the festival today.
You have not broken up yet?
It is not like I do not like him anymore...
I have always had a crush on him...
Why the heck are you bringing up Kousei now?
Ever since we were little, we have always done everything together,
and rather than someone of the opposite sex,
I see him as a kid brother.
Are you trying to jinx yourself by chanting that kid brother, kid brother curse?
You are too scared not to.
Because the comfortable relationship you have right now would be destroyed.
I was saving that omelette for last!
I told you, it is not like that!
I chose the wrong method of attack.
Arima-kun was afraid, but he still took the plunge.
Someday, there will be no turning back, you know.
Hey, you do not have to be nice.
Clothes make the man, as they say.
What did I tell you, Kashiwagi?
Kousei would never say that to me.
Today's the day of the festival, huh?
No, on second thought, I will stand.
You are going to be okay, right?
You are not lying about being tested, right?
You are not going to tell me you are never coming back to school, right?
You are going to start cussing me out again, right?
We can talk in the music room again, right?
This is what he brought me.
I hear you played alone at the gala concert?
What kind of a show-off are you?
It was a gala concert for violinists, so it does not make any sense!
Anyone would have expected you to withdraw.
It was because someone insulted you.
But then midway through, the sound disappeared...
My mom's words, her gestures, her smell...
My memories of my mother turned into notes, and flew away into the sky.
You are an artist no matter what, are not you?
She chose that song for me.
This song reminds me of my mother.
The sound of the piano as I looked up drowsily.
A linoleum floor, cloudy and white.
I wish I could have heard it, your piano.
I wish I could have played with you again.
You are going to be fine, right?
You are not lying about the tests, right?
You are not going to tell me you are never coming back to school, right?
I can see you again, right?
That you called me by my name.
The Sumiya Baseball Youth Sports Club special boot camp for sluggers will now begin!
I want to play video games!
Ten sets of ten sprints down the beach!
But I do not play baseball.
Even people who play the piano need to build up their legs!
It is just that your feet are huge.
Is that any way to talk to a maiden?
Kousei, let us go to Ouji Park!
I wish I could, but I have got piano lessons.
I was going to show him a mud ball as shiny as a rainbow!
Great job, if I say so myself.
I will make one for Kousei, too.
I just learned how to throw a sinker.
Kousei-kun's going to be a pianist, so he is busy.
What would he do if he hurt his hands?
to practice the piano, because he is got a competition coming up.
O Vreneli, where is your home?
It is by the beautiful lake
You are slacking off because I am not watching you, are not you?
You do not have to tell me to practice!
Every single day, both Hanon and Czerny!
When am I supposed to sleep?
I do not know what this is about, but calm down...
Do not talk about stuff we do not understand.
I am turning to you because I cannot back off!
I am not interested in girls who are not in love with me.
If someone tells her, You are wrong, you know she is going to sulk,
and get all stubborn, and then things will get complicated.
Especially when it comes to Kousei.
I do not relish the thought...
But I... I want Tsubaki to smile again.
Even if she gets all bruised and battered, Tsubaki's still going to have to realize it herself.
The fact that the guy by her side is not her kid brother at all.
Watari-senpai, the scrimmage is about to start!
Have you made up your mind yet?
You are the only holdout in my class.
What school you want to go to.
That is what made me think...
That I would like to become a really weird pianist!
You should give it some thought.
Who do I want to become?
He dropped it on the beach, and would not stop crying, so I gave him my popsicle.
And then he says he wished it was milk-flavored!
It is fun to hear about Arima-kun.
Well, you live next door to each other, so of course you have the same memories.
He is like your kid brother, right?
He is the boy who is smaller than me, who lost his mother at a young age,
who I cannot help doting on...
And the one I wished would get back on his feet.
Use your heart to solve those kinds of problems.
I cannot make sense of what you are saying these days!
The other day, you told me that you did not dislike Saito-senpai, but...
Like and do not dislike are millions of light-years apart, you know.
I do not know what you mean.
You need to be honest with yourself and admit it, or someone is going to get hurt.
You are the senpai I always had a crush on.
Who is it that I like?
You should not scavenge for food!
I got a call from Kashiwagi-san.
She said you were in trouble!
Who knew Kashiwagi-san would pull a prank like that?
So she is human, too, after all.
It is strangely compelling, coming from Kashiwagi.
It is not a laughing matter.
I was running around like crazy because I believed her.
Well, I am hearing it ad nauseam from the house next door!
I do not play it that much.
I could hear some really lousy playing.
If our eyes happen to meet, my heart flip-flops.
With you, I can tell right away.
It is because summer is coming to an end.
They light up, like the headlights of a car.
When you are playing the piano.
It was pouring out of you... this gentleness, and a desire to convey something.
It is like you are shouting to the world, I am right here!
You are the kind of pianist who can convey all that, huh?
You are an artist no matter what, are not you?
I am going to go to a high school with a music course.
Hiroko-san said I only had to go to class twice a week or so.
Of course, I am not sure that I will get in...
Because I sat out for a while.
Music is taking Kousei far away from me.
Go wherever you want, dummy Kousei!
He is the boy who is smaller than me,
who lost his mother at a young age,
who I cannot help doting on...
And the one I wish would get back on his feet.
To go on like this, for all time...
The boy I took for granted would always be by my side.
The boy I want to be by my side forever.
I wonder if Kousei will be surprised.
